au.edu.uq.aurin.logging

Class Rlogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uq.aurin.logging.Rlogger

  • public final class Rlogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Rlogger setup the logging infrastructure in R. This is used with AURIN WORKFLOW to setup the log levels and the logging directory. Default log level: OFF Default log directory: TMP_LOG_DIRECTORY which is set by: System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir") Invalid log level is defaulted to OFF Invalid log directory is defaulted to TMP_LOG_DIRECTORY R supports the following log levels: OFF, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG R does not support log level: TRACE
    Author:
    irfan
